about_the_game:
Hunt down the "Visagens" from Brazilian folklore in a fast-paced, old-school run-and-gun action game!

Prepare for an epic adventure set in 1915 Brazil, where you become Bento, a fearless blind cowboy hunting supernatural monsters. Your mission: to hunt down the feared "Visagens"—legendary creatures from folklore that roam the land, leaving destruction in their wake.

"Undead, specters, beasts, djinns, mutants, dwarves or giants... These nightmare creatures are called Visagens. They have but one purpose: to kill."
— R. Teófilo

Amidst the chaos of one of Brazil's most devastating droughts, Visagens follows Bento, a cowboy who lost his family and his sight after a fateful encounter with the Famaliá, the demon of the bottle. Rescued by Teófilo, a supernatural hunter, Bento becomes his disciple, taking on the grim task of exterminating the evil beings known as "Visagens."

Armed with a mysterious revolver and aided by the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse, Bento will face creatures from Brazilian folklore, including the Saci, Mula-sem-Cabeça, Mapinguari, and more, while traversing unique settings like remote villages, steam trains, and cursed cemeteries.

As you journey through the outbacks, uncover Bento's tragic past and how he became a relentless Visagens hunter. Every revelation brings him closer to his revenge, as each battle becomes a life-or-death struggle. Get ready for an action-packed, emotional adventure where the stakes are as high as the thrill!

Key Features:

  • Hand-Drawn Graphics: Dive into a richly detailed world with meticulously crafted 2D hand-drawn visuals that bring every setting and creature to life, from eerie ossuaries to lush but sinister forests.

  • Immersive Storytelling: Experience a gripping narrative inspired by Brazilian folklore, where mythical creatures like the Saci, Mula-sem-Cabeça, and Mapinguari await your challenge.

  • Eight Unique Stages: Explore the exotic landscapes of Brazil, from remote villages in the arid sertão to ominous steam trains, dark caves, and opulent yet haunted mansions. Each stage presents new secrets, challenges, and a distinct visual flair.

  • Eight Formidable Bosses: Face off against twelve unforgettable bosses, each with their own unique mechanics and folklore-inspired designs, ensuring no two fights are ever the same.

  • Dynamic Shooting Angles: Master precision-based combat by aiming in 32 different directions, making each fight a tactical and immersive experience.

  • Vertical Gameplay: Utilize rooftops and ground levels to your advantage, adding strategic depth to your encounters with enemies, both human and supernatural.

  • Supernatural Mounts: Take the thrill of combat to the next level with supernatural horses. During intense shoot 'em up segments, ride one of four supernatural mounts and obliterate enemies from both land and sky.

  • Powerful Upgrades: Build your Power Bar through combat and unleash the devastating "True Sight" state, drastically amplifying your attack power, speed, and unlocking passive abilities from equipped Visions.

  • Summon Supernatural Powers: Charge up your Summon Bar and call upon the powers of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse—each offering unique abilities to change the course of battle and rain devastation upon your enemies.

Visagens is more than just a game—it's an epic journey through the heart of Brazilian folklore, blending fast-paced run-and-gun action with dark, mythical storytelling. With its intricate design, breathtaking hand-drawn art, and intense supernatural combat, Visagens offers players a truly unforgettable experience in the indie gaming scene. Prepare yourself for a world where every decision matters, every enemy poses a deadly threat, and only the sharpest reflexes can lead you to victory.

  • Processor: 4-core CPU @ 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GTX 660 or AMD HD 5850 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 64 bits
  • Processor: 7-core CPU @ 2.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 MB available space

short_description: Visagens is an action-packed 2D side-scrolling shooter that offers a captivating mix of fast-paced action, supernatural intrigue, and rich Brazilian folklore. With stunning hand-drawn graphics, the game draws heavy inspiration from iconic titles like Sunset Riders and Castlevania.
